page.title: 12A WALK ALONG DOWELL STREET
page.content: DOWELL STREET IS WHERE A373 ROAD ENTERS HONITON. FROM THE BRIDGE OVER THE BYPASS THERE IS A NEW ESTATE (BROOKSIDE) OF SMALL SMART HOUSES MAINLY FOR ELDERLY RESIDENTS. CONTINUING ALONG, ON THE RIGHT IS THE D.L.O.(DIRECT LABOUR ORGANISATION) DEPOT- FOR ROAD MAINTENANCE ETC, & THE AMBULANCE STATION- 24 HOUR SERVICE. NEXT IS THE MAGISTRATES COURT & THE REGISTER OFFICE. THERE IS ALSO A LARGE CAR PARK (FREE FOR CARS) WITH TOILET FACILITIES. NEXT IS THE RECENTLY RENOVATED FINE ARTS GALLERY & BEHIND IT IS A NEW MAGNUS ESTATE- CURRENTLY BUILDING 23 3/4 BEDROOMED HOUSES. THERE ARE ALSO PLANS FOR ABOUT 80 MORE ALONG THE RIVER GISSAGE. RETURNING ALONG THE OTHER SIDE OF THE ROAD, THERE ARE COUNCIL HOUSES, THE FIRE STATION, & THE BRITISH LEGION HALL (USED FREQUENTLY FOR SOCIAL FUNCTIONS)
